fields.name: version
docs: the data version of this account.

fields.name: lootExclusivityTime
docs: amount of time when the last-hitter of a fleet will have exclusive access to loot

fields.name: starbaseUpgradeProgressContinuation
docs: amount of time that is added to starbase level 0 upgrade process in case it is destroyed

fields.name: crewRespawnTime
docs: Time taken for crew to respawn when a starbase is destroyed

fields.name: rawShipsRespawnTime
docs: Time taken for individual ships to respawn when a starbase is destroyed

accounts.name: craftingInstance
docs: This account is used to store relevant information for a crafting process instance

fields.name: version
docs: The data version of this account

fields.name: numCrew
docs: The number of crew taking part in the crafting process

accounts.name: disbandedFleet
docs: Keeps track of a fleet while it is disbanded

fields.name: version
docs: The data version of this account.

fields.name: gameId
docs: The game id this belongs to.

fields.name: starbase
docs: The `Starbase` at which the original `Fleet` was disbanded.

fields.name: fleetLabel
docs: The label or name of the disbanded fleet.

fields.name: fleetShips
docs: The `FleetShips` account belonging to the original `Fleet` that was disbanded.

fields.name: version
docs: The data version of this account.

fields.name: gameId
docs: The game id this belongs to.

fields.name: subProfile
docs: If [`Some`] will have the exclusive ability to interact with this fleet.

fields.name: subProfileInvalidator
docs: The authority for revoking a sun-authority.

fields.name: fleetLabel
docs: The label or name of the fleet.

fields.name: shipCounts
docs: The number of ships in the fleet.

fields.name: warpCooldownExpiresAt
docs: The time at which the warp cooldown expires

fields.name: scanCooldownExpiresAt
docs: The time at which the scan cooldown expires

fields.name: cargoHold
docs: The Cargo pod representing the fleet's cargo hold

fields.name: fuelTank
docs: The Cargo pod representing the fleet's fuel tank

fields.name: ammoBank
docs: The Cargo pod representing the fleet's ammo bank

fields.name: apReloadExpiresAt
docs: The time at which reloading completes

fields.name: shieldBreakDelayExpiresAt
docs: The time at which SP can resume regenerating

fields.name: lastCombatUpdate
docs: The last time the combat was updated

accounts.name: fleetShips
docs: Keeps track of a the individual ships that make up a fleet

fields.name: version
docs: The data version of this account.

docs: The data version of this account.

fields.name: profile

accounts.name: gameState
docs: Keeps track of variables that may change frequently during a `Game` session

fields.name: version
docs: The data version of this account

accounts.name: loot
docs: Represents the loot available at a location

fields.name: version

fields.name: creator

accounts.name: mineItem
docs: Represents a token registered as an item that can be mined

fields.name: version
docs: The data version of this account.

fields.name: gameId
docs: the game_id account this item is registered with

fields.name: mint
docs: the mint representing the items mined

fields.name: resourceHardness
docs: How hard it is to mine this item -> Ranges from 1-10

fields.name: numResourceAccounts
docs: The number of resource accounts for this mine item

fields.name: version
docs: The data version of this account.

fields.name: sector
docs: the sector that this belongs to

fields.name: amountMined
docs: the cumulative amount mined from this `Asteroid`

fields.name: numResources
docs: the number of resources at this `Asteroid`

fields.name: numMiners
docs: the number of entities currently mining at this `Asteroid`

accounts.name: playerCrewRecord
docs: An account used to record how many crew members have been added to the game by a player
This is meant to be used temporarily during the crew "pre add" period where players can add crew members to the game but not use them

docs: The data version of this account

accounts.name: resource
docs: Represents a mine-able item existing at a particular location (e.g. a planet)

docs: The data version of this account.

fields.name: systemRichness
docs: How abundant the resource is at the location -> Ranges from 1-5

fields.name: amountMined

fields.name: numMiners
docs: the number of entities currently mining this resource

fields.name: version
docs: The data version of this `Starbase` account.

fields.name: gameId
docs: the game_id that this `Starbase` belongs to

fields.name: sector
docs: the sector that this `Starbase` belongs to

fields.name: craftingFacility
docs: the [`CraftingFacility`] to use for crafting at this `Starbase`

fields.name: upgradeFacility
docs: the [`CraftingFacility`] to use for upgrade jobs at this `Starbase`

fields.name: state
docs: The state of the `Starbase`. Is a [`StarbaseState`].

fields.name: sectorRingAvailable
docs: The planet position (`sector::state::Ring`) available for this `Starbase`

fields.name: upgradeIngredientsChecksum
docs: used to check if expected upgrade ingredients have been supplied

fields.name: numUpgradeIngredients
docs: number of ingredients needed for starbase upgrade

fields.name: upkeepAmmoBalance
docs: The balance of ammo for upkeep

fields.name: upkeepAmmoLastUpdate
docs: The last time ammo for upkeep was updated (Local time)

fields.name: upkeepAmmoGlobalLastUpdate
docs: The last time ammo for upkeep was updated (Global time)

fields.name: upkeepFoodBalance
docs: The balance of food for upkeep

fields.name: upkeepFoodLastUpdate
docs: The last time food for upkeep was updated (Local time)

fields.name: upkeepFoodGlobalLastUpdate
docs: The last time food for upkeep was updated (Global time)

fields.name: upkeepToolkitBalance
docs: The balance of toolkits for upkeep

fields.name: upkeepToolkitLastUpdate
docs: The last time toolkits for upkeep was updated (Local time)

fields.name: upkeepToolkitGlobalLastUpdate
docs: The last time toolkits for upkeep was updated (Global time)

fields.name: builtDestroyedTimestamp
docs: The last time the starbase was built or destroyed

fields.name: shieldBreakDelayExpiresAt
docs: The time at which SP can resume regenerating

fields.name: version
docs: The data version of this account

fields.name: oldTotalCrew
docs: The old total crew members from the player's fleets at the `Starbase`
This is used BEFORE crew program features are turned ON

fields.name: newTotalCrew
docs: The new total crew members from the player's fleets at the `Starbase`
This is used AFTER crew program features are turned ON

fields.name: busyCrew
docs: The number of crew members that is engaged/busy and not available

fields.name: updatedShipEscrowCount
docs: Number of updated items in `RemainingData` list
This will be `ship_escrow_count` when all ships in escrow are up-to-date

fields.name: version
docs: The data version of this account.

fields.name: gameId
docs: The game_id that this belongs to

fields.name: resourceMint
docs: The mint of the resource spent when scanning for SDUs

fields.name: coordinatesRange
docs: e.g. a value of [-50, 50] means that coordinates from [-50, -50] to [50, 50] are valid for SDU scanning

fields.name: cssCoordinates
docs: The locations of the central space stations (CSS) of the three factions

fields.name: originCoordinates
docs: The co-ordinates of the "origin"; used in calculating SDU probability

fields.name: cssMaxDistance
docs: The max distance from the nearest CSS; used in calculating SDU probability

fields.name: originMaxDistance
docs: The max distance from the `origin_coordinates`; used in calculating SDU probability

fields.name: distanceWeighting
docs: The distance weighting; used in calculating SDU probability

fields.name: tMax
docs: The maximum time before SDU probability at a location changes

fields.name: xMul
docs: Multiplier in the X dimension; used in noise function

fields.name: yMul
docs: Multiplier in the Y dimension; used in noise function

fields.name: zMul
docs: Multiplier in the Z dimension; used in noise function

fields.name: sduMaxPerSector
docs: The maximum number of SDUs that can be found per scan per sector

fields.name: scanChanceRegenPeriod
docs: The amount of time in seconds that it takes for a sector scan chance to fully regenerate

docs: the index of the key in the player profile

docs: The crafting recipe required to upgrade a `Starbase` to this level

docs: The crafting recipe category enabled for crafting at a `Starbase` of this level.

fields.name: hp
docs: The `Starbase` health points for this level.

fields.name: sp
docs: The `Starbase` shield points for this level.

fields.name: sectorRingAvailable
docs: The planet position `Ring` available for this level

fields.name: warpLaneMovementFee
docs: Fee charged for the "warp lane" movement type which is meant to be charged in ATLAS
Since ATLAS has 8 decimal places, units are in the smallest value of ATLAS possible.

fields.name: repairFee
docs: Fees paid to repair a fleet docked at a Starbase of this level
Since ATLAS has 8 decimal places, units are in the smallest value of ATLAS possible.

fields.name: repairEfficiency
docs: the repair efficiency of the starbase

fields.name: shieldRechargeRate
docs: the amount of SP regenerated per second

fields.name: shieldBreakDelay
docs: the time it takes the starbase's SP to start regenerating after getting to 0
